allSaves.value: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

details.flavorText: Perhaps more than any other devil, osyluths-also known as bone devils- embrace the torture and sadism for which Hell is so well known. They are exemplary inquisitors with an unwavering devotion to Hell's laws and hierarchy, and they seek out heresies among mortals and devilkind with equal vigor. These devils arise from the Styx-fed swamps of Stygia, Hell's fifth layer, from the stagnant energy of long-dead heresies. Left to their own devices, osyluths build massive, calcified hives in Stygia's remote corners and hunt the infernal swampland for lesser devils and petitioners.
details.sidebarText:
Artists of Agony

An osyluth practices the craft of torture with the passion of an artist. Their skill draws forth all manner of truths and secrets from their victims, which an osyluth can recall with immaculate precision even centuries later. Over time, osyluths amass sizable collections of information, making them particularly valuable resources to diabolists and other evil spellcasters who crave infernal knowledge. Of course, such conjurers also often employ osyluths for the devils’ cruel talents of interrogation, perpetuating the cycle of spilled blood and stolen secrets.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes full initial damage but no @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}, and the spell ends immediately.

Failure The target takes full initial and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1. If the target recovers from being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} ends and the spell ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2.

Heightened The damage increases by 2d4 and the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage} by 1d4.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You interfere with the target's ability to teleport and travel between dimensions. Dimensional anchor attempts to counteract any teleportation effect, or any effect that would move the target to a different plane. The duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Failure The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The effect's duration is 1 hour.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You interfere with the target's ability to teleport and travel between dimensions. Dimensional anchor attempts to counteract any teleportation effect, or any effect that would move the target to a different plane. The duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Failure The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The effect's duration is 1 hour.

description.label: Description
description.value: Falsehoods ring in your ears like discordant notes. You gain a +4 status bonus to Perception checks when someone Lies.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

Saving Throw DC 25 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 [[/r 2d6 # poison damage]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 (1 round); Stage 2 [[/r 3d6 # poison damage]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 (1 round); Stage 3 [[/r 3d6 # poison damage]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 2 (1 round), and the creature takes a -4 status penalty to Will saves against attempts to Coerce it (this is a mental effect)
The bone devil can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} on itself using only 1 action.

A bone devil deals an extra [[/r 2d6 # damage]] damage whenever it hits an creature that has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} condition with any of its Strikes.
The bone devil sweeps its tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

You make an appeal to a powerful devil, asking it to bind some of its subordinates to your service. If you succeed, the devil sends you its choice of one devil whose level is no more than double infernal pact's level, two devils whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three devils whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success The devils are sent to you and serve you for 1d4 weeks.
Success The devils are sent to you and serve you for 1d4 days.
Failure Your request is denied.
Critical Failure Not only is your request denied, but the powerful devil sends word of its displeasure to your master.
